rukus.text: Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya chagunda ntima
Lyele ni lisiku (lya Kiyama) lyachachiwa wandu (sakalaalii!) mpela mapuluputwa gakusapalala
Nombe matumbi gachiwa (nkuwululuka) mpela litonji lyetyosye mbele
Sano mundu jwachiukasitope n'diingo wakwe (wa yambone, nikwepepala yakusakala)
Basi jwalakwejo takawe mu ndamo jakusengwasya
Nambo mundu jwachiukajepepale n'dingo wakwe (wa yambone, ni kusitopa yakusakala)
Basi liuto lyakwe ni ku Hawiya
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya jele (Hawiya)
